<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.2.2.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If delivered by personal delivery (including express delivery), on the date of sign-in;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.2.2.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If delivered by registered post, then on the fifteenth day after the date on the return receipt.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage267"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.2.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Binding force
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement shall be binding upon all Parties hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Language
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement is made in quintuplicate in the Chinese language, with one copy
	thereof for each party hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Day and working day
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A &#147;day&#148; as referred to herein shall be a calendar day, and a
	&#147;working day&#148; herein shall refer to any day from Monday to Friday.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The headings of this Agreement are for convenience of reference only, and may not be
	used in the interpretation of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The obligations, undertakings and liabilities of the Authorizers hereunder to Party
	A are joint and several, and the Authorizers are jointly and severally liable to each other. As for Party A, the breach of any of the Authorizers shall automatically constitute a breach of the Authorizers.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	Any and all matters uncovered hereunder shall be resolved in accordance with
	the laws of the People&#146;s Republic of China by consultation between and among the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	(No text herein below)

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Loan Agreement (the
	&#147;Agreement&#148;) is entered into on&nbsp;November 17, 2015 in Beijing, by and between:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Whereas the shareholders
	of Beijing NQ Technology Co., Ltd. (the &#147;Domestic-funded Company&#148;)were altered from Linyu, Zhou Xu, Shi Wenyong(the &#147;former shareholders of the Domestic-funded Company&#148;) to Guo Lingyun, Zhou Xu, Shi Wenyong, and all parties
	aforementioned have already reached an agreement concerning the abovementioned shareholders alteration. Party A, shareholders of Party B and Party C have reached LOAN AGREEMENT and LOAN AGREEMENT concerning the capital increment respectively in
	June&nbsp;5, 2007 and June&nbsp;6, 2012(the &#147;Original Agreement&#148;), the Original Agreement shall be revised and restated due to the alteration of debtor-creditor relationship hereof, therefore the Original Agreement shall be terminated upon
	the date when this Agreement come into effect, provisions of rights and obligations of each party hereto shall be subject to this Agreement. Amended and Restated Loan Agreement is reached as follows:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Party A (the &#147;Lender&#148;) is a wholly foreign owned company incorporated and registered in Beijing;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Party B (the &#147;Borrower&#148;) is the shareholder of Beijing NQ Technology Co., Ltd. (the &#147;Domestic-funded Company&#148;), holding 100% equity of the Domestic-funded Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage270"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Through friendly negotiations, the Parties hereto reach the Agreement as follows for mutual compliance:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein, the Lender agrees to provide, and the Borrower agrees to accept, a loan in an total amount of
	RMB 50,000,000 (Shi Wenyong, Zhou Xu and Guo Lingyun respectively holds 14.75%, 33.25% and 52% of the loan).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Borrower agrees to use the above mentioned loan only as the registered capital of the Domestic-funded Company, which shall be RMB 50,000,000.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Borrower shall use such loan only for the purpose set forth in this Article, and shall not use such loan for any other purpose, unless it
	has obtained the written consent in advance from the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Conditions precedent for the provision of loan by the Lender to the Borrower are:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The representations and warranties made by the Borrower in the Article&nbsp;8 hereof are true, complete, correct, and not misleading.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Borrower does not breach any of its undertakings in the Article&nbsp;9 and Article&nbsp;10 hereof, and there is no any event occurring or threatening to occur which will possibly influence the Borrower&#146;s
	performance of its obligations hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lender agrees that, on condition that all the conditions precedent set forth in the Article&nbsp;3 hereof are satisfied or are waived by the Lender in writing, the Lender will transfer the loan amount to the account
	designated by the Borrower in one lump sum. The Borrower or its trustee shall issue the receipt to the Lender at the same day of receiving such loan. The Parties hereby agree and confirm, the undertakings with respect to the loan made by the
	Borrower under this Agreement are applicable to the Borrower or its designated trustee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Each Party hereby agrees and confirms that the loan hereunder is a non-interest-bearing loan unless otherwise specified herein.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The term of loan hereunder is ten (10)&nbsp;years and may be extended by the Parties through a written consent. During the term of loan or the extended term of loan, once the following circumstance occurs, the loan
	provided by the Lender to the Borrower hereunder shall expire early with immediate effect:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage271"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Borrower resigns from or is dismissed by the Lender or any affiliate of the Lender; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

</TD>

	Any other third party claims an amount exceeding RMB 100,000 from the Borrower.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Once the term
	of loan expires, any Borrower (or its successor or assignee) shall immediately return the amount borrowed by it to the Lender, or, with the Lender&#146;s consent, transfer such borrowed amount to any other shareholder of the Domestic-funded Company
	or the person designated by the Lender, and such Borrower&#146;s rights and obligations hereunder shall terminate at same time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	than by means of borrowing certain amount of money; and (ii)&nbsp;the liability which has been disclosed to, and approved of by the Lender in writing;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	for those entered into in course of normal business operation;

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	10.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement inures only for the benefits of the Parties hereto, the successors and permitted assignees of the Parties hereto, and is binding upon the above mentioned Parties. Without the other Party&#146;s prior
	written consent, neither Party shall not assign, pledge or transfer in any other way, its rights, benefits or obligations hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	11.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The conclusion, validity, interpretation, performance, amendment, termination of, and resolution of disputes arising from, this Agreement shall be governed by laws of the PRC.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	12.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Arbitration
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	12.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any dispute, controversy or claim arising from or in connection with this Agreement (including the existence, validity or termination of this Agreement) shall be submitted to China International Trade and Economic
	Arbitration Commission (&#147;CIETAC &#147;) for arbitration according to its then effective rules and proceeding. The arbitral award is final and binding upon the Parties. The arbitration shall be conducted in Beijing. The arbitration language is
	English.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage274"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	12.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The arbitral tribunal consists of three (3)&nbsp;arbitrators. Each Party appoints one (1)&nbsp;arbitrator. The presiding arbitrator of arbitral tribunal shall be jointly appointed by both Parties through negotiations.
	Should both Parties fail to reach consensus regarding the appointment of the presiding arbitrator within twenty (20)&nbsp;days following the appointment of its respective arbitrator, the Chairman of CIETAC shall appoint the presiding arbitrator.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	13.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement becomes effective upon being signed, and becomes invalid once each Party fulfills the performance of its obligations hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	14.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement shall not be amended or changed unless consented by both Parties in writing. Any issue not contemplated herein shall be supplemented by the Parties by signing respective agreement in writing. Any
	amendment, change, supplemental to this Agreement as well as any exhibit hereto, shall constitute an integral part of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	15.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement constitutes an integral agreement between the Parties regarding the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all previous oral discussion or written advices reached by the Parties with respect to the above
	mentioned subject matter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	16.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement is severable. The invalidity or unenforceability of any term hereof does not influence the validity or enforceability of any other term hereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	17.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Each Party shall keep strictly confidential any confidential materials regarding the other Party&#146;s business, operation, financial status obtained by it through this Agreement or during the performance of this
	Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	18.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement is made in four (4)&nbsp;original copies, each Party holding one (1)&nbsp;copy. Each copy has the same legal effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<B>
	Termination Agreement

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Termination
	Agreement (the &#147;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) is entered into on January&nbsp;25, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</B>

	No.&nbsp;1093 Luyuannan Road, Tongzhou District, Beijing

	Building No 11 Hepingli East Street Road Dongcheng District, Beijing

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	&#147;

	&#148; and individually, &#147;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Whereas:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	WFOE is an exclusively foreign-owned enterprise duly incorporated and existing under the laws of RRC;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Domestic Company is a limited liability company duly incorporated and existing in Beijing city with its main business of technology development; technical consulting; technical services; design of enterprise image;
	organization of culture and art exchanges; information consultation (excluding intermediary services); consulting and survey; design, production, agent, release of advertisements; conference service; technology import and export; import and export
	of goods; sales of electronic products, computer software and ancillary equipment; information service business under the second type of value-added telecommunication business (only including mobile value-added telecom business); internet
	information services;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Lin Yu and Vincent Wenyong Shi are the Former Shareholders of the Domestic Company, holding 100% shareholding in the Domestic Company when the Control Documents (as defined below) were entered into between and among the
	Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	WFOE, the Domestic Company and the Former Shareholders entered into a whole set of control documents listed in Schedule I (the &#147;
<B>
	Control Documents
</B>
	&#148;) on July&nbsp;2, 2014.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage277"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Now it is hereby agreed to terminate the Control Documents as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 1 Termination of the Control Documents and Release
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Parties agree that the Lin Yu shall transfer 78% shareholding in the Domestic Company to Beijing NQ Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;
<B>
	Beijing Technology
</B>
	&#148;) in accordance with and pursuant to the Exclusive
	Option Agreement of the Control Documents (&#147;
<B>
	Share Transfer
</B>
	&#148;), meanwhile Beijing Technology will assume Lin Yu&#146;s payment obligation under the Loan Agreement of the Control Documents, and the Parties have entered into the Share
	Transfer Agreement and the relevant agreement for the debt transfer attached hereto as Schedule II. The Parties hereby agree to terminate the Control Documents subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Parties agree, as of the date upon completion of the change registration of shareholder under the Share Transfer at the governing registration authority (&#147;
<B>
	Termination Date
</B>
	&#148;), to terminate the
	Control Documents and all the rights and obligations of the Parties under the Control Documents shall be terminated and released as of the Termination Date. The Parties acknowledge that there is no disputes arising out of the execution and
	performance of the Control Documents so far and shall now or at any time in the future refrain from seeking liabilities or making any claims for compensation. Each of the Parties shall not enjoy any rights under the Control Documents nor shall bear
	any obligations or liabilities under the Control Documents after the Termination Date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The termination of the Control Documents shall not be deemed as the breach of the Control Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Parties shall process the deregistration formalities within five days after the entry of this Agreement provided that there are registration matters under the Control Documents (including but not limited to the
	share pledge registration).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 2 No Assignment
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Neither the Agreement nor any rights and/or interests according to this Agreement are assignable by either of the Parties without the prior consent of the
	non-assigning Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 3 Confidentiality
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms of this Agreement are confidential and all disclosures made by the Parties must be regarded as confidential. Confidential information received by
	either Party must be kept strictly confidential to a standard not less than that which the receiving Party applies to its own confidential information and no less than reasonably expected. No announcement or other disclosure may be made concerning
	the contents of this Agreement or any ancillary matter except:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage278"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	as required by law or any regulatory authority; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	with the prior written approval of other Party; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	to a Party&#146;s professional advisors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 4 Notice
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any notice or other correspondence under this Agreement (&#147;Notice&#148;) shall be made in writing (delivered personally, by post, fax or e-mail) and delivered to the notified party in accordance with the address or
	number designated in Schedule III and shall constitute a valid notice only if the name of the contact person is specified:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If any of the above details are changed, the Party shall notify the other Party of the change in writing within seven (7)&nbsp;days in
	accordance with the foregoing notice requirements, otherwise, the notice sent to its original address or numbers shall be deemed as valid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The date and time of service of notices delivered as above shall be determined as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any notice delivered personally shall be deemed as served when being signed by the recipient and not served without signature of the recipient;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any posted or couriered notice shall be delivered by way of registered mail, express mail or courier, and shall be deemed as served 48 hours after the receipt signature obtained from the recipient or the representative
	of the recipient (postponed accordingly in case of any public holidays);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any notice sent by fax or e-mail shall be deemed as served upon a delivery confirmation obtained. When the notice is sent on a public holiday, it shall be deemed as served on the first following working day.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 5 Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement shall be governed by, interpreted under and construed in all respects in accordance with the PRC laws. If any part of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the unenforceable or invalid
	part shall be construed in accordance with applicable law to the greatest extent possible to reflect the original intent of the Parties, and the remainder of the provisions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In the event that the Dispute cannot be resolved amicably, any Party may submit such Dispute to China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission (CIETAC) for arbitration which shall be conducted in
	accordance with the CIETAC&#146;s arbitration rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration. The arbitral award is final and binding upon all parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 6 Miscellaneous
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Amendment. Except as otherwise provided herein, this Agreement shall not be amended, modified, cancelled or terminated except by a written instrument duly executed by each of the Parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage279"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Entireness. This Agreement constitutes the entire and definitive agreement between among the Parties relating to the termination of the Control Document and supersedes all previous agreements, intent, negotiations and
	discussions between the Parties relating to the subject matter hereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The failure to exercise or delay in exercising a right or remedy under this Agreement shall not constitute a waiver of the right or remedy or a waiver of any other rights or remedies and no single or partial exercise of
	any right or remedy under this Agreement shall prevent any further exercise of the right or remedy or the exercise of any other rights or remedies.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Language. This Agreement is written in both Chinese and English language. In case there is any conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail. This Agreement is made in 4
	originals.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Effectiveness. This Agreement shall be effective after signed and sealed by the Parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	Schedule II: Share Transfer Agreement/ Agreement
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Share Transfer Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Share
	Transfer Agreement (this &#147;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) is entered into by and between the following parties on
<U>
	January&nbsp;25, 2016
</U>
	in Beijing, China
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Transferor (hereinafter the &#147;
<B>
	Party A
</B>
	&#148;):
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	LinYu
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ID Number: 352124197612060013
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Transferee: (hereinafter the &#147;
<B>
	Party B
</B>
	&#148;)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Beijing NQ Mobile Technology Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Address: Rm.1322, Unit
	C, Building 1, Zhongguancun Software Park Incubator, Haidian District, Beijing, P.R.China.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Through negotiation, Party A and Party B reach the following
	Agreement with respect to transfer of 78% shares (herein after the &#147;
<B>
	Transferred Shares
</B>
	&#148;) of FL Mobile Jiutian Technology Co., Ltd. (herein after the &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;):
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 1 Representation and Warranties
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Party A and Party B have competent credit status and capacity to execute and perform this Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Party A is the shareholder of the Company and owns 78% shares of the Company (RMB10,530,000 of the registered capital of the Company).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 2 Share Transfer
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Party A agrees to transfer 78% shares of the Company owned by it (RMB10,530,000 of the registered capital of the Company) to Party B, and Party B agrees to acquire such shares;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Transferred Shares shall contain all the shareholder rights and interests attached &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; thereon and have no defect and encumbrance;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Upon completion of share transfer subject to this Agreement, Party B shall own 78% shares of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	After the share transfer, Party B shall enjoy corresponding rights and bear corresponding obligations according to its share proportion in the Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 3 Portion and Consideration of Transferred Shares
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Party A and Party B agree to transfer the Transferred Shares at a price of RMB10,530,000, which means the consideration for the 78% shares of
	the Company acquired by Party B from Party A is RMB10,530,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 4 Closing Date and Method
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Upon consummation of the following conditions, the above consideration of share transfer shall be paid by Party B to Party A:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement has been duly executed by both parties hereto;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Transactions contemplated hereunder have been approved by Shareholders&#146; Meeting of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Other shareholders of the Company have waived their right of first refusal with respect to the Transferred Shares;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage283"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Party A shall return the capital contribution certificate of shareholder to the Company, and the Company shall issue a new capital contribution certificate of shareholder to Party B.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 5 Effectiveness
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement shall
	become effective as of the date upon duly execution by the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 6 Rights of This Agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Without written consent by the other Party, either Party shall not transfer rights and obligations under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 7 Taxes and Other Expenses
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Parties
	agree to respectively assume any taxes and fees arising from performance of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 8 Breach of Agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In the event of any breach of this Agreement by either Party, such Party shall bear compensation liability to the non-breaching Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 9 Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of PRC. In the event of any dispute with respect to this Agreement, the Parties shall first
	resolve the dispute through friendly negotiations. In the event the Parties fail to reach an agreement on the dispute, either Party may submit the relevant dispute to the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission for arbitration
	in accordance with its then effective arbitration rules. The arbitration shall be conducted in Beijing. The arbitration award shall be final and binding on both Parties. When any dispute is under arbitration, except for the matters in dispute, other
	provisions of this Agreement shall be continued to be performed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 10 Miscellaneous
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	10.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	All notices pursuant to this Agreement shall be in writing and delivered personally or sent by courier, or by facsimile transmission. Any such notices given by personal delivery shall be deemed effectively served as of
	delivery at the address of the other Party; notices sent by facsimile transmission shall be deemed effectively served when replying code or other confirmation signal has been received; notices or other documents sent by courier shall be deemed
	effectively served in 3 business days.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	10.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any amendment to this Agreement shall become effective in form of execution in writing by both Parties, and any amendment and supplement shall be deemed as an integrant part of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Article 11 Language and Counterparts
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This
	Agreement is written and executed in five (5)&nbsp;copies in both Chinese and English. In case of any inconsistence between Chinese and English version, the Chinese version shall prevail. Each Party shall hold one counterpart of this Agreement, and
	the other three counterparts are for registration and filing with the competent governmental authorities.
</P>

<B>

</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Agreement (the &#147;

	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) is entered into on November&nbsp;25, 2015.

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Lin Yu
</B>
	, an individual, Chinese ID No. 352124197612060013,
<B>
	Vincent Wenyong Shi
</B>
	, an individual, Chinese ID No. 352124197711280513, Lin Yu and Vincent Wenyong Shi are collectively referred to as the
	&#147;
<B>
	Former Shareholders
</B>
	&#148;.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this Termination Agreement, the parties are collectively referred to as
	&#147;
<B>
	Parties
</B>
	&#148; and individually, &#147;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Whereas:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	WFOE is an exclusively foreign-owned enterprise duly incorporated and existing under the laws of PRC;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Domestic Company is a limited liability company duly incorporated and existing in Beijing city with its main business of technology development; technology promotion, technology transfer, technical consulting;
	technical services; computer system services; data processing; computer systems service; design, production, agent, release of advertisements;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Lin Yu and Vincent Wenyong Shi are the Former Shareholders of the Domestic Company, holding 100% shareholding in the Domestic Company when the Control Documents (as defined below) were entered into between and among the
	Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	WFOE, the Domestic Company and the Former Shareholders entered into a whole set of control documents listed in Schedule I (the &#147;
<B>
	Control Documents
</B>
	&#148;) on September&nbsp;11, 2013.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	now it is hereby agreed to terminate the Control Documents as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage289"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 1 Termination of the Control Documents and Release
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Parties agree that the Former Shareholders shall transfer 100% shareholding in the Domestic Company to FL Mobile Jiutian Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;
<B>
	FL Mobile
</B>
	&#148;) in accordance with and pursuant to the
	Exclusive Option Agreement of the Control Documents (&#147;
<B>
	Share Transfer
</B>
	&#148;), meanwhile FL Mobile will assume Former Shareholders&#146; payment obligation under the Loan Agreement of the Control Documents, and the Parties have entered
	into the Share Transfer Agreement and the relevant agreement for the debt transfer attached hereto as Schedule II. The Parties hereby agree to terminate the Control Documents subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Parties agree, as of the date upon completion of the change registration of shareholder under the Share Transfer at the governing registration authority (&#147;
<B>
	Termination Date
</B>
	&#148;), to terminate the
	Control Documents and all the rights and obligations of the Parties under the Control Documents shall be terminated and released as of the Termination Date. The Parties acknowledge that there is no disputes arising out of the execution and
	performance of the Control Documents so far and shall now or at any time in the future refrain from seeking liabilities or making any claims for compensation. Each of the Parties shall not enjoy any rights under the Control Documents nor shall bear
	any obligations or liabilities under the Control Documents after the Termination Date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The termination of the Control Documents shall not be deemed as the breach of the Control Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Parties shall process the deregistration formalities within five days after the entry of this Agreement provided that there are registration matters under the Control Documents (including but not limited to the
	share pledge registration).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 2 No Assignment
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Neither the Agreement nor any rights and/or interests according to this Agreement are assignable by either of the Parties without the prior consent of the
	non-assigning Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 3 Confidentiality
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms of this Agreement are confidential and all disclosures made by the Parties must be regarded as confidential. Confidential information received by
	either Party must be kept strictly confidential to a standard not less than that which the receiving Party applies to its own confidential information and no less than reasonably expected. No announcement or other disclosure may be made concerning
	the contents of this Agreement or any ancillary matter except:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	as required by law or any regulatory authority; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	with the prior written approval of other Party; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage290"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	to a Party&#146;s professional advisors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 4 Notice
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any notice or other correspondence under this Agreement (&#147;Notice&#148;) shall be made in writing (delivered personally, by post, fax or e-mail) and delivered to the notified party in accordance with the address or
	number designated in Schedule III and shall constitute a valid notice only if the name of the contact person is specified:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If any of the above details are changed, the Party shall notify the other Party of the change in writing within seven (7)&nbsp;days in
	accordance with the foregoing notice requirements, otherwise, the notice sent to its original address or numbers shall be deemed as valid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The date and time of service of notices delivered as above shall be determined as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any notice delivered personally shall be deemed as served when being signed by the recipient and not served without signature of the recipient;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any posted or couriered notice shall be delivered by way of registered mail, express mail or courier, and shall be deemed as served 48 hours after the receipt signature obtained from the recipient or the representative
	of the recipient (postponed accordingly in case of any public holidays);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any notice sent by fax or e-mail shall be deemed as served upon a delivery confirmation obtained. When the notice is sent on a public holiday, it shall be deemed as served on the first following working day.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 5 Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Agreement shall be governed by, interpreted under and construed in all respects in accordance with the PRC laws. If any part of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the unenforceable or invalid
	part shall be construed in accordance with applicable law to the greatest extent possible to reflect the original intent of the Parties, and the remainder of the provisions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In the event that the Dispute cannot be resolved amicably, any Party may submit such Dispute to China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission (CIETAC) for arbitration which shall be conducted in
	accordance with the CIETAC&#146;s arbitration rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration. The arbitral award is final and binding upon all parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	Article 6 Miscellaneous
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Amendment. Except as otherwise provided herein, this Agreement shall not be amended, modified, cancelled or terminated except by a written instrument duly executed by each of the Parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Entireness. This Agreement constitutes the entire and definitive agreement between among the Parties relating to the termination of the Control Document and supersedes all previous agreements, intent, negotiations and
	discussions between the Parties relating to the subject matter hereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The failure to exercise or delay in exercising a right or remedy under this Agreement shall not constitute a waiver of the right or remedy or a waiver of any other rights or remedies and no single or partial exercise of
	any right or remedy under this Agreement shall prevent any further exercise of the right or remedy or the exercise of any other rights or remedies.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Language. This Agreement is written in both Chinese and English language. In case there is any conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail. This Agreement is made in 3
	originals.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Effectiveness. This Agreement shall be effective after signed and sealed by the Parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;/s/ Chen Haoyang
